location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch map to illustrate report' concerning attacks on Muscat in Oman

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:385 x 448 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Tracing of a sketch map of Oman drawn and signed by Robert A. Benn, Political Agent, Muscat. Attached to a copy of report on rising of the Omani tribes (folios 87-118) showing the area of unrest with the ‘direction of enemy’s attack’ indicated by red pecked line.
